Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kaze to Ki no Uta Sanctus: Sei Naru Kana

Good Comments: Translation seemed good and they were fast as well.
Quite a bit of mistranslations and outright guesses.
As expected from DB and Live-evil the translations are well done.
Since it's a joint they probably split the edit/TL into two or more parts and it shows. Quality>Speed guys.

DB and Live-Evil are good at what they do, and it shows in their previous works, but they don't seem to capture the Haruhi "essence" as well as a.f.k. and Yuki are are able to do. i.e. If you're looking for Haruhi, look for her somewhere else.

always have been an active viewer of dattebayo's work; their translation this time around was just as expected: accurate as can be. Localization did not influence translations. Looking forward to staying with this fansub company
Only ep1, but better than afk/chihiro
Bad Comments: Not as good as afk, but that doesn't mean they're bad. It's a tossup between this and Coalgg for my 2nd/backup choice.
at least they're not joke subbers

Good Comments: Good sub and the annotations were interesting !
it is quite nice, and they provide kanji and the words in the opening "Blaze" has a colored gradient!
Bad Comments: The best subs of all made for TC. Good translation, good timing, good color ^_^

Good Comments: Dropped after like 4 episodes...seriously this shouldnt be up this high lmao
Bad Comments: nice timing and easy to understand..very good
perfect subs...it can easily be understood by the ones who are watching subbed animes

Good Comments: Thanks for releasing this old series! ^^
Bad Comments: the only one, thank you, great quality.
